title: Candid confessions with PV Sindhu
text:
We have with us ace badminton player PV Sindhu, a shuttler who has made the country proud with her game. The current World Champion makes waves when she hits those brilliant smashes and bats the shuttle across in style inspiring millions. Off the court too, she is an inspiration for many as she believes that women are strong and can achieve whatever they desire.



Now, the ace Indian badminton player shares some of her mother's words of wisdom that she holds close to her heart and she also describes what her first 60 seconds look like after she reaches home. So, stay tuned!

Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season
description: We have with us ace badminton player PV Sindhu, the shuttler who has made the country proud with her game, and she is the current world champion of badminton.
